OOC:No one was responding to me so I'm just going to attack.
Spiderdemon and   Scarletspider flew to the battle scene.
Spiderdemon shoots out web at Kup trying to catch  him for a snack.
ScarletSpideruses his venom blaster on Kup and fires 25 times.Then he 
uses his venomous electric chain webbing and shoots it at Kup.
